channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Save $50 on Our Favorite Budget Graphics Card
item.description: You can get an Nvidia GeForce RTX 5060 Ti for $379 at Walmart.

item.title: A Former Apple Luminary Sets Out to Create the Ultimate GPU Software
item.description: Demand for AI chips is booming—and so is the need for software to run them. Chris Lattner’s startup Modular just raised $250 million to build the best...

item.title: This AI-Powered Robot Keeps Going Even if You Attack It With a Chainsaw
item.description: A single AI model trained to control numerous robotic bodies can operate unfamiliar hardware and adapt eerily well to serious injuries.

item.title: Zoox asks federal regulators for exemption to launch a commercial robotaxi service
item.description: The exemption would allow the Amazon-owned autonomous vehicle company to commercially deploy its custom-built robotaxis, which lack traditional contro...

item.title: Cohere hits $7B valuation a month after its last raise, partners with AMD
item.description: A fresh $100 million and an interesting partnership with AMD has slightly bumped Cohere's valuation up.

item.title: Neon, the No. 2 social app on the Apple App Store, pays users to record their phone calls and sells data to AI firms
item.description: A new call recording app is gaining traction for offering to pay users for voice data from calls, which is sold to AI companies.

item.title: YouTube now lets you hide recommendation pop-ups at the end of videos
item.description: The decision to let users hide end screens is a welcome addition to the platform, especially since they can end up covering the last bit of a video an...

item.title: Trump administration wants 10% stake in American lithium miner that sells to GM
item.description: Lithium Americas asked for a small change to the loan repayment period, which spurred the latest Trump administration request for equity.

item.title: Larry Ellison Is a ‘Shadow President’ in Donald Trump’s America
item.description: The Ellison family is cornering the market on attention and data the same way the Vanderbilts did railroads and the Rockefellers did oil.

item.title: The 15 Best Tried and Tested Gifts for Bird Lovers (2025)
item.description: Whether your giftee loves bird watching, bird feeding, or just putting a bird on it, these gifts are sure to be a hit.
